title: How do I turn off "enter your pin for extra security"?
content:
I have smart lock enabled for home and work. I also use finger print recognition. At home I still have to enter my pw occasionally even when I've used my phone recently.  I get a message saying something like "enter your own for extra security".  I'd like to not have to enter my pw again - that's why I enabled fingerprints - I want quick and easy.  Can I disable this annoying feature?

Smart lock has never worked at my office.

I really just want to be able to use my  fingerprint all the time, every time, everywhere.  Sorry, Google, but that's how it was on my Moto and I liked it.  I don't keep my life on my phone. I don't want the extra security.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
